message.content: {"given_definition_quality":70,"better_definition":"noodles (with the 'er' sound in Beijing accent)","sentence":"我吃面条儿。","image_prompt":"A young child sitting at a table, happily eating a bowl of long noodles with chopsticks. The setting is bright and cheerful, with steamy noodles, a bowl, and simple kitchen items. Animate the noodles slightly swirling. Soft apocalypse animation style: pastel, muted colors, gently surreal, slight dreamy haze, subtle traces of a world changing peacefully outside the window.","sentence_translation":"I eat noodles."}
